text:
The get token.py script handles the OAuth 2.0 authentication process to obtain a Spotify
access token. It starts by defining the Spotify credentials (CLIENT ID and CLIENT SECRET),
the redirect URI, and the required scope. The script generates an authorization URL, which
the user visits to log in and authorize the app. After authorization, the user is redirected to
the specified redirect URI with an authorization code.
The user then inputs this code into the script. The script exchanges the authorization
code for an access token by sending a POST request to Spotify’s token endpoint with the
necessary headers and data.

Figure 8: Client Credentials Flow

[Some parts of this script are inspired by the Spotify API documentation examples and](https://github.com/spotify/web-api-examples/tree/master)
tutorials from YouTube.
